entry.title: 等价无穷小
entry.content:
原式变形
$ sinu $$ u $
$ tanu $$ u $
$ arcsinu $$ u $
$ arctan $$ u $
$ 1-cosu $$ \frac{1}{2}u^2 $
$ cosu-1 $$ -\frac{1}{2}u^2 $
$ e^{u} $$ u $
$ 1-e^{u} $$ -u $
$ a^{u}-1 $$ u·lna $
$ ln(u+1) $$ u $
$ log_a(u+1) $$$ \frac{u}{lna} $$
$$ \sqrt[n]{1+u}-1 $$$ \frac{1}{n}·u $
$ (1+u)^n-1 $$ n·u $
$ tanu-sinu $$ \frac{1}{2}u^3 $

entry.title: 四六级作文模板
entry.content:
原因分析型

第一段：描述现状，用两句话分别描述当今社会存在何种现象，引起何种问题。
In recent years, __ has been prevailing among __. Thus, __.
第二段（主体段）：分析问题出现的原因（原因分析型）
A number of factors can account for such phenomenon, but the following might be the critical ones. First and foremost, __. Moreover, __. Therefore, __.
第三段：提出结论和建议
As far as I am concerned, __. On the one hand, __. On the other hand, __. In a word, __.

对比选择型

第一段：提出话题，指出人们对此看法不一
In recent years, it is widely accepted that __. However, people’s opinions vary from person to person.
第二段（主体段）：分别论述两方面的看法及原因（对比选择型）
Some people hold the view that __ mostly because __. However, other people argue that __. Firstly, __. Secondly, __. In addition, __.
第三段：表明自己的观点和理由
From my perspective, I give my support to __. On the one hand, __. On the other hand, __.

第一段：提出话题，指出人们对此看法不一
In recent years, it is widely accepted that __. However, people’s opinions vary from person to person.
第二段（主体段）：分别论述两方面的看法及原因（对比选择型）
Some people believe that __, mainly because __. While others argue that __.
第三段：表明自己的观点和理由
As for me, I am in favor of __. For one thing, __. For another, __.

图画类对比选择

第一段：描述图画内容，表达图画深层含义
As is vividly depicted in the cartoon above, _.Obviously, the symbolical meaning of this picture is to show that __.
第二段（主体段）：具体分析双方观点，发表评论（对比选择型）
As we all know, __ plays an important role in __. For one thing, __. For another,__. Meanwhile, __.
第三段：提出建议，总结观点
In one word, _. We must _________.

问题解决型

第一段：描述现象，提出问题
In recent years/Nowadays, _ becomes more and more of a problem in _. What’s worse, _.
第二段（主体段）：分析问题可能产生的后果
As everyone knows, __ is/are bringing great damage/harm to _. Moreover, _. Therefore, effective measures should be taken to __.
第三段：给出解决问题的方法或建议（问题解决型）
I think several measures as follows should be taken immediately. Firstly, __. Secondly, _. In addition/Besides, __. All in all,__.

书信类

Dear xxx（收信人）,
I’m writing this letter to express my thanks to you for __. I would not have known how to __ without your kind help.
I still remember that day clearly when __. …
I really appreciate that you have given me a hand when __. I’m looking forward to your reply.

Sincerely，
xxx
（写信人）

叙事型

第一段：表明写信目的或缘由，表达感谢
I’m writing this letter to express my thanks to you for __. I would not have known how to __ without your kind help.
第二段（主体段）：直接叙事，说明原因（叙事型）
I still remember that day clearly when __. …（后面开始叙述整件事的前因后果，主体段主要叙述。）
第三段：再次感谢，表达祝福
I really appreciate that you have given me a hand when __. I’m looking forward to your reply.
